publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4461 Stewart Stevenson: Community Councils—That the Parliament agrees that community councils play a vital role in Scotland’s democracy and should receive adequate funding and professional support to enable them to fulfil their role.
S2M-4461 Community Councils (lodged on 30 May 2006) Mr David Davidson*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-4461 Community Councils (lodged on 30 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*, Ms Maureen Watt*

S2M-4461 Stewart Stevenson: Community Councils—That the Parliament agrees that community councils play a vital role in Scotland’s democracy and should receive adequate funding and professional support to enable them to fulfil their role. Supported by: Mr David Davidson, Shiona Baird, Nora Radcliffe, Ms Maureen Watt
S2M-4461 Community Councils (lodged on 30 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4461 Community Councils (lodged on 30 May 2006) Linda Fabiani*
